mapper.select: select EquipNo, dbo.GetCodeInfoNameByID(EquipNo) EquipNo_name, LocNo, dbo.GetCodeInfoNameByID(LocNo) LocNo_name, ManagementNo, PenetrationNo , ManagementAreaYN, Elevation, FirePreventionAreaNo, InspectionRoomNo, BackRoomNo, PenetrationForm, dbo.GetCodeInfoNameByID(PenetrationForm) PenetrationForm_name, Wall_FloorNo, FirewallYN, WallMeterial, dbo.GetCodeInfoNameByID(WallMeterial) WallMeterial_name, WallThickness, FrontPicNo, BackPicNo, ReferenceFloorPlanNo, LocationFloorPlanNo, SealDetailDWG, EL, Diameter, Height, Length, PenetrationType, MaximumFreeArea, MaximumFreeDistance, Register, Reviewer, Checker, SpecialNote, RegID, FORMAT(RegDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh:mm:ss') RegDateTime FROM penetrationbaseinfo WHERE 1=1 ${cond} ORDER BY RegDate desc
SELECT count(*) FROM penetrationbaseinfo WHERE Seq = '${Seq}'
mapper.update: update penetrationbaseinfo SET EquipNo = '${EquipNo}', LocNo = '${LocNo}', Elevation_num_pit = ${Elevation_num_pit}, Elevation_num_inc = ${Elevation_num_inc}, FirePreventionAreaNo = '${FirePreventionAreaNo}', InspectionRoomNo = '${InspectionRoomNo}', BackRoomNo = '${BackRoomNo}', PenetrationForm = '${PenetrationForm}', Wall_FloorNo = '${Wall_FloorNo}', FirewallYN = '${FirewallYN}', WallMeterial = '${WallMeterial}', WallThickness = '${WallThickness}', FrontPicNo = '${FrontPicNo}', BackPicNo = '${BackPicNo}', ReferenceFloorPlanNo = '${ReferenceFloorPlanNo}', LocationFloorPlanNo = '${LocationFloorPlanNo}', SealDetailDWG = '${SealDetailDWG}', EL = '${EL}', Diameter = '${Diameter}', Height = '${Height}', Length = '${Length}', PenetrationType = '${PenetrationType}', MaximumFreeArea = '${MaximumFreeArea}', MaximumFreeDistance = '${MaximumFreeDistance}', SAFETY_CATEGORY = '${SAFETY_CATEGORY}', ANCHORTYPE = '${ANCHORTYPE}', LATERALMOVEMENT = '${LATERALMOVEMENT}', LINETEMPERATURE = '${LINETEMPERATURE}', VENTILATION_VALUE = '${VENTILATION_VALUE}', VENTILATION_VALUE_RANGE = '${VENTILATION_VALUE_RANGE}', VENTILATION_VAL_NO = '${VENTILATION_VAL_NO}', VENTILATION_JUDGMENT = '${VENTILATION_JUDGMENT}', VENTILATION_REASON = '${VENTILATION_REASON}', FIRE_VALUE = '${FIRE_VALUE}', FIRE_VALUE_RANGE = '${FIRE_VALUE_RANGE}', FIRE_VAL_NO = '${FIRE_VAL_NO}', FIRE_JUDGMENT = '${FIRE_JUDGMENT}', FIRE_REASON = '${FIRE_REASON}', RADIATION_VALUE = '${RADIATION_VALUE}', RADIATION_VALUE_RANGE = '${RADIATION_VALUE_RANGE}', RADIATION_VAL_NO = '${RADIATION_VAL_NO}', RADIATION_JUDGMENT = '${RADIATION_JUDGMENT}', RADIATION_REASON = '${RADIATION_REASON}', FLOOD_VALUE = '${FLOOD_VALUE}', FLOOD_VALUE_RANGE = '${FLOOD_VALUE_RANGE}', FLOOD_VAL_NO = '${FLOOD_VAL_NO}', FLOOD_JUDGMENT = '${FLOOD_JUDGMENT}', FLOOD_REASON = '${FLOOD_REASON}', PRESSURE_VALUE = '${PRESSURE_VALUE}', PRESSURE_VALUE_RANGE = '${PRESSURE_VALUE_RANGE}', PRESSURE_VAL_NO = '${PRESSURE_VAL_NO}', PRESSURE_JUDGMENT = '${PRESSURE_JUDGMENT}', PRESSURE_REASON = '${PRESSURE_REASON}', Register = '${Register}', Register_date = '${Register_date}', Reviewer = '${Reviewer}', Reviewer_date = '${Reviewer_date}', Supporter = '${Supporter}', Supporter_date = '${Supporter_date}', Technicker = '${Technicker}', Technicker_date = '${Technicker_date}', Checker = '${Checker}', Checker_date = '${Checker_date}', CertificationYN = '${CertificationYN}', Com_name = '${Com_name}', ManagementObjYN = '${ManagementObjYN}', NewYN = '${NewYN}', Wall_Fire_time = '${Wall_Fire_time}', SpecialNote = '${SpecialNote}', UpdateID = '${RegID}', UpdateDate = getdate() where ManagementNo = '${ManagementNo}' and PenetrationNo = '${PenetrationNo}'
